entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.38.0
entry.content:
Changelog

  • Updated artifact distribution for Debian/Ubuntu releases. See https://infisical.com/docs/cli/overview.

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.39.0
entry.content:
Changelog

  • 5753eb7d7 rename install file
  • cb86aa40f update install scrip for deb

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.121.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(k8s): k8s auth automatic service account token creation by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3348
  • Update Helm chart to version v0.9.1 by @github-actions in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3375
  • Add filter by role for org identity and search identity api by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3367
  • feat: added winget to build by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3384
  • Remove rate limits on self host by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3386

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.120.0-postgres...infisical/v0.121.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.122.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: scim improvements and ui fixes by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3304
  • Add condition to avoid secret names that contain forward slashes by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3392
  • fix: address runtime error for secret approval requests by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3393
  • feat(project-identity): get project identity by membership ID by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3389
  • Add secret sync vercel integration by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3338
  • feat: camunda app connection and secret sync by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3373
  • Infisical SSH - V2 by @dangtony98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3347
  • Add access request note and change secret request to change request by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3395
  • update vite to 5.4.18 by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3400
  • Terraform cloud integration by @carlosmonastyrski in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3360

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.121.0-postgres...infisical/v0.122.0-postgres
